briefTitle: Evaluating the Haemostatic Effect of NNC 0129-0000-1003 During Surgical Procedures in Subjects With Haemophilia A.
officialTitle: Efficacy and Safety of NNC 0129-0000-1003 During Surgical Procedures in Patients With Haemophilia A
summary: This trial is conducted globally. The aim of this trial is to evaluate the haemostatic effect of NNC 0129-0000-1003 during surgical procedures in subjects with haemophilia A.

primaryOutcome.measure: Haemostatic Effect During Surgery Evaluated by the Four-point Scale, Assessed by the Investigator/Surgeon at the Day of Surgery - Four-point Response Scale: Excellent, Good, Moderate or None
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Assessed by the Investigator/surgeon at the day of surgery
